Kuna da tabbacin kuna son kunna wannan zaɓin? Matsakaicin darajar Personal Iterations Multiplier (PIM) shi ne 2147468. Tsallake tabbatarwar Disk na Ceto Kada a nuna dialog na saƙon jira lokacin yin ayyuka Kada a tambayi Algorithm na Hash a allon tabbatarwa kafin farawa Kuznyechik shine cipher na block da aka fara wallafa a 2015 kuma aka bayyana a cikin Tsarin Kasa na Rasha GOST R 34.12-2015 da kuma a cikin RFC 7801. Mabuɗi 256-bit, block 128-bit. Yanayin aiki shine XTS. Wanda aka samar haɗin gwiwa ta Mitsubishi Electric da NTT na Japan. An fara wallafa shi a 2000. Mabuɗi 256-bit, block 128-bit. Yanayin aiki shine XTS. An amince dashi don amfani ta ISO/IEC, aikin NESSIE na Tarayyar Turai da aikin CRYPTREC na Japan. Lokaci Iterations Kafin Farawa Kafin ku ɓoye rarraba, dole ne ku ƙirƙiri Disk na Ceto na VerraCrypt (VRD), wanda yake cike da waɗannan manufofin:

- Idan VerraCrypt Boot Loader, mabuɗi shugaban, ko wasu bayanai masu mahimmanci suka lalace, VRD yana ba ku damar dawo dasu (lura, duk da haka, za ku har yanzu shiga da kalmar sirri daidai).

- Idan Windows ta lalace kuma ba zai iya farawa ba, VRD yana ba ku damar buɗe rarraba kafin Windows ya fara.

- VRD zai ƙunsar ajiyar na'urar EFI boot loader na yanzu kuma zai ba ku damar dawo da shi idan ya zama dole.

Za a ƙirƙiri hoton ZIP na Disk na Ceto na VerraCrypt a wurin da aka ƙayyade a ƙasa. An ƙirƙiri hoton ZIP na Disk na Ceto na VerraCrypt kuma an adana shi a cikin wannan fayil:
%s

Yanzu kuna buƙatar cire shi zuwa sandar USB wanda aka tsara shi azaman FAT/FAT32.

%lsBayan kun ƙirƙiri Disk na Ceto, danna Next don tabbatar da cewa an ƙirƙire shi daidai. An ƙirƙiri hoton ZIP na Disk na Ceto na VerraCrypt kuma an adana shi a cikin wannan fayil:

 Ba za a iya tabbatar da cewa an cire Disk na Ceto daidai ba.

Idan kun cire Disk na Ceto, don Allah cire kuma sake shigar da sandar USB; sannan danna Next don sake gwadawa. Idan wannan bai taimaka ba, don Allah gwada wata sandar USB da/ko wani software na ZIP.

Idan ba ku cire Disk na Ceto ba tukuna, don Allah ku yi hakan, sannan danna Next.

Idan kun ƙoƙarin tabbatar da Disk na Ceto na VerraCrypt da aka ƙirƙira kafin farawa wannan wizard, don Allah a lura cewa irin wannan Disk na Ceto ba za a iya amfani da shi ba, saboda an ƙirƙira ta don wani mabuɗi daban. Kuna buƙatar cire sabon hoton ZIP da aka haifar na Disk na Ceto. Ba za a iya tabbatar da cewa an cire Disk na Ceto daidai ba.

Idan kun cire hoton Disk na Ceto zuwa sandar USB, don Allah cire kuma sake shigar da sandar USB; sannan sake gwadawa. Idan wannan bai taimaka ba, don Allah gwada wani software na ZIP da/ko matsakaici na biyu.

Idan kun ƙoƙarin tabbatar da Disk na Ceto na VerraCrypt da aka ƙirƙira don wani mabuɗi, kalmar sirri, gishiri, da sauransu daban, don Allah ku lura cewa irin wannan Disk na Ceto koyaushe zai gaza wannan tantancewar.  Bayan kun ƙirƙiri Disk na Ceto, zaɓi 'Tsari' > 'Create Rescue Disk' don tabbatar da cewa an ƙirƙiri daidai. A halin yanzu ba zai yiwu a ɓoye tsarin idan SecureBoot yana kunne kuma idan mabuɗan musamman na VerraCrypt ba su haɗe zuwa cikin firmware na na'ura ba. Ci gaba? Na'urar Gaskiya Juzu'in da aka zaɓa marar aiki ba shi da alaƙa da wasikar tuƙi a cikin Windows don haka ba za a iya buɗewa a cikin Windows Explorer ba. Cire mabuɗan ɓoyewa daga ƙwaƙwalwar idan an shigar da sabon na'ura MUHIMMAN BAYANI:
 - Don Allah a tuna cewa wannan zaɓin ba zai ci gaba bayan rufe/sake farawa ba saboda haka zaku buƙaci zaɓi shi da farko idan aka fara na'ura.

 - Tare da wannan zaɓin a kunne kuma bayan an haɗa sabuwa na'ura, na'urar zai tsaya cak zai ƙare da BSOD saboda Windows ba zai iya samun damar temet faifan bayan an cire mabuɗan daga ƙwaƙwalwar.
 Starting Yi amfani da mai samar da lambobin bazuwar na CPU azaman ƙarin tushen entropy Yi amfani da tsoffin matsakaicin tsawon kalmar sirri (64 haruffa) Kunne ɓoyewar mabuɗan da kalmomin sirri da aka adana cikin ƙwaƙwalwa Benchmark: Ƙirƙira na'urar gaskiya kawai ba tare da ɗora a wasikar tuƙi da aka zaɓa ba Kalmar sirri da aka shigar tana da tsawo: wakilcin UTF-8 ta ya zarce 64 bytes. Juzu'in ɓoyayyen ba zai iya samun kalmar sirri, PIM da mabuɗan kama da na gaba ba VerraCrypt ba ya goyan bayan ɓoye faifan tsarin wanda BitLocker ya riga ya ɓoye. Testin sabis na cryptographic kernel ya samu kuskure. Sabis na cryptographic na kernel naku mafi kuskwali ba ya goyan bayan juzu'ai fiye da 2 TB.

Yiwuwar mafita:
- Ƙara karancin kernel na Linux zuwa version 2.6.33 ko daga bisani.
- Kashe amfani da sabis na ɓoyewa na kernel (Saituna > Zaɓuɓɓuka > Hadin Tsari) ko amfani da 'nokernelcrypto' mount option a layin umarni. An kasa kafa na'urar loop. Wani dalilin da ake buƙata yana ɓace. Bayanan juzu'in suna ɓace. Rukunin ɓoyayya yana buƙata. Rukunin ɓoyayya an riga an yi amfani da shi. Ba a kayyade kalmar sirri ko fayil mai mabuɗi ba. 

Lura cewa kalmomin sirri na tabbatarwa kafin farawa ana buƙatar su rubuta su a yanayin kafin farawa inda babu tsarin maɓallin da ba na Amurka ba. Don haka, kalmomin sirri na tabbatarwa kafin farawa dole ne su rubuta su koyaushe ta amfani da tsarin maɓallin Amurka na al'ada (saɓanin haka, kalmar sirri za ta kasance rubutu da ba daidai ba a mafi yawancin lokuta). Duk da haka, lura cewa ba ku buƙatar na gaske maɓallin Amurka ba; kuna buƙatar canza tsarin maɓallin a cikin tsarin aikinku.

Kalmar sirri ta fi {0} haruffa tsayi. An buƙaci na'ura na rarraba. Kalmar sirri da ba daidai ba a don kariyar juzu'in ɓoyayyen ko juzu'in ɓoyayyen ba ya wanzu. Fayilolinn mai mabuɗi da/ko kalmomin sirri don kariyar juzu'in ɓoyayyen ba daidai ba ne ko juzu'in ɓoyayyen ba ya wanzu. An samu haruffa da ba daidai ba. Kuskure yayin parsar tsari. Don Allah a tabbatar cewa directory na wucin gadi yana wanzu, izinin tsarinsa yana ba ku damar samun damar zuwa gare shi, kuma akwai isashen sarari faifai. Kuskure: Na'urar tana amfani da girman sassa da ba na 512 ba.
